name: Starking Apple
description: Fresh, Crisp, and Tangy

name: Williams Bananas
description: Bright and Yellow with Sweet, Soft, Flesh

name: Triple Crown Blackberries
description: Vibrant and Sweet Summer Berries

name: Cape Black Fig
description: Sweet and velvety, perfect for a picnic basket

name: Black Grapes
description: Nectar of the gods! Grapes are one of the best fruits out there!

name: Blood Orange
description: Brilliant and striking aesthetic artisanal oranges

name: Blueberries
description: One of the most versatile fruits, great when eaten as a bunch

name: Canteloupe
description: A fruit of many names, "Sweet Melon" and "Spanspek" are a few common names for it! Wonderfully sweet and delicious.

name: Maraschino Cherries
description: Famous for it's usage in fruity cocktails, the Maraschino cherry is one of the best that cherries have to offer.

name: Dragonfruit
description: These unique fruits are rising in popularity and have a sweet flesh similar to the taste of pineapple and the kiwi fruit. This is the fruit of a cactus plant.

name: Cape Gooseberries
description: These tart fruits are encased in a dried leaf sheath. Great option for artisanal jams and jellies.

name: Kiwi Fruit
description: This hairy fruit has a bright green and refreshing flesh with a unique tropical flavor.

name: Citrus Limetta
description: This special variant of the lemon is less tart and more sour than a regular lemon. These can be eaten like any other fruit.

name: Canistel
description: This exotic fruit looks and feels like a pear-papaya variant, but it is the fruit of a special evergreen tree. This fruit smells and tastes exactly like an egg yolk!

name: Queen Pineapple
description: This royal pineapple variety is especially sweet and firm. Perfect for fruit salads and smoothies.

name: Angel Red Pomegranate
description: This bright red pommy variant is the best on the market. Its vibrant red juice and large pips sets it above the rest

name: Ruby Grapefruit
description: These bittersweet citrus fruits are fantastic either on its own or juiced. This fruit is a cross between a pomelo and sweet orange.

name: Starfruit
description: Sweet, crunchy, and slightly tart but with a fantastic refreshing aftertaste. Definitely a MUST!

name: Strawberries
description: These classic fruits of love are ideal for dessert. The taste of the strawberry is accentuated when dipped in chocolate or drizzled with balsamic vinegar.

name: Watermelon
description: This supersweet and crunchy fruit is ideal for those hot summers. Not only does it taste fantastic, it hydrates too!

name: Muscat Blanc Grapes
description: These white grapes are the sweetest of its kind. The popping sweetness alongside its light-bodied feel makes it a great choice for everyday snacking and jams.
